Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My educators generally provide more details in their feedback versus AI feedback. However, sometimes educators may have limited time and energy to look through every part of my submitted work; educators may be good at pointing out room for improvement but can be less comprehensive compared to AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I feel feedback from GenAI generally more positive in terms of tone of delivery. But its feedback contains not just praises but some quite helpful tips and suggestions that help me look at areas where I didn’t pay enough attention.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I heard that assessors of students’ work generally have limited time for providing feedback. So I don’t expect much from them. I use GenAI extensively to comment on the potential room for improvement for my work.
